ON THE DOMESTIC FRONT — The big story of the week is about voting and elections — the collapse of Biden’s efforts to enact voting rights reforms, and the ongoing revelations about former President DONALD TRUMP’s plans to overturn the results of the 2020 election, and both men’s attempts to use executive orders to bend things to their will.

JUST THAT KIND OF WEEK — Merriam-Webster’s top words of the week: “minor” and “gaffe.” “President [JOE] BIDEN made a statement using the former word in a manner that many people felt qualified as an example of the latter,” the dictionary website wrote, citing the president’s remarks about Russia and Ukraine on Wednesday.
